title: Catoctin Mountain Park: Partners
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Partners            Partners       Government Agencies - Federal: Department of Agriculture, U.S. Forest Service, Forest Pest Management Unit Department of Homeland Security, U.S. Secret Service Department of the Interior, U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service, Biological Resources Division Department of the Navy, Naval Support Facility - Thurmont   Government Agencies - State of Maryland: MD Department of Agriculture MD Department of the Environment MD Department of Natural Resources  MD Forest Service MD Natural Resources Police MD Park Service   Cunningham Falls State Park  MD State Highway Administration MD State Police         Government Agencies - Local: Town of Thurmont Tourism Council of Frederick County Frederick County Sheriff's Department Upper Monocacy Watershed Alliance      Academic Institutions: Frederick Community College Hood College Mount St. Mary's College      Non-Profit Organizations: National Park Foundation - Enriches national parks and programs through private support.   Eastern National - Promotes the public's understanding and support of  national parks through quality educational experiences, products, and services. Alice Ferguson Foundation Boy Scouts of America Boy Scouts of America, Order of the Arrow, Catoctin and Appalachian Trail Chapters Catoctin Forest Alliance Friends of Big Hunting Creek Frederick County Chamber of Commerce Greater Washington National Park Fund The Journey Through Hallowed Ground The League for People with Disabilities Guardian Hose Company Blue Ridge Summit Fire Company Smithsburg Volunteer Fire Company Wolfsville Volunteer Fire Company
